name: Yenepa
description:
A 2nd year student project and a thriller game. 

In this game, you must find your friends and escape from the temple of Talugmai. But beware, you don't seem to be alone here.

Created on Unreal Engine 4 by a team of 4 people: 1 programmer, 2 artists and myself as Level and Narrative Designer. The game concept was created by the whole team.

Artistic and narrative elements could not be implemented due to lack of time.
